title: format-string + ret2libc (or format string only)?
content:
I found that we have a format-string bug with in argument 7. I found a function containing system(
/bin/sh
)). So I'm not saying stupidity I have to mess with a format-string and a 
ret2libc
(correct me if I'm wrong). I don't know how to exploit it, can you help me? Images: Ghidra and GDB
